metadata.description: Plugin marketplace for Claude and other AI tools

plugins.name: perimetre-brand-guidelines
plugins.description: Keep Claude aligned with Périmètre's visual identity. Loads brand guidelines — colours, typography, and logo usage — so every deliverable looks and feels on-brand.

plugins.name: perimetre-apps
plugins.description: Périmètre patterns and best practices for JS/TS/React/Next.js apps. Includes framework patterns (error handling, services, tRPC, forms, GraphQL, caching, SEO), code review, React performance rules, composition patterns, and design engineering guidance.

plugins.name: perimetre-design-system
plugins.description: Expert guidance for implementing and extending @perimetre/ui — a brand-aware React component library built on Tailwind CSS v4, CVA, and Radix UI. Covers design tokens, brand variants, component architecture, accessibility, and CVA patterns.

plugins.name: perimetre-wordpress
plugins.description: WordPress development patterns and code review for Périmètre projects. Covers PHP standards, security, Gutenberg blocks, REST API, headless WP, and i18n.

plugins.name: perimetre-documents
plugins.description: Professional document writing guidance for the Périmètre team — structure, clarity, tone, and formatting for reports, proposals, and presentations.

plugins.name: perimetre-discover
plugins.description: Plugin discovery assistant for the Périmètre marketplace. Scans your project context or reads conversational cues, then recommends the right plugins with plain-language explanations and copy-pasteable install commands.
